choices: On Selma’s Bed While She Is Sleeping
On A Movie Set (Or Her Trailer)
1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who lives in a terrible and miserable orphanage.

You are a massive fan of the Latino actress Salma Hayek (https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0112851/med...), she started in such films like Frida, From Dusk Till Dawn, The Hitmans Bodyguard and DESPERADO. Ever since you seen that movie you fell in love with her (especially with Her Introduction Scene, the Sex Scene And The Scene Where She Is Singing In Bed).

You love everything about her, Her Sexy Accent, Her Smooth Skin, Her Ageless Face, Her Bouncing Boobs, Sculptured Legs And Most Importantly HER FEET (you have a foot fetish).

You wish you can leave this place and be with Salma Hayek. One night you are actually desperate enough to wish on a star and wish that you can be with her and you don’t care how (even though you should).

The next morning you wake up in a strange envoirmemt....
1.title: Shrunk

info.brief_description: You get shrunk and must survive the actress who doesn’t know you are there
info.description:
You are Jack and you get shrunk into the life of the actress.

Just know that this is a fictionalised version of Hayek.

RULES:
No Deaths
Keep It Unaware (If Found You Are A Bug Or Toy)
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
Keep It Focus On Salma Hayek (She Can Have Sex But That’s It)
Describe What She Looks Like Or Wearing (Of Use Images)
